amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the graduated commercial driver's license program language in the bill and replace it with a study on the safety of intrastate teen truck drivers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 21 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to strike the graduated commercial driver's license program language in H.R. 3763 and replace it with a study on the safety of intrastate teen truck drivers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lewis amendment (A062) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 248 (Roll no. 604).

action.text: Amendment (A062) offered by Mr. Lewis to the Rules amendment (A001).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lewis amendment (A062) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 248 (Roll no. 604).
